location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 53 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Short letter reporting the arrivals of the Yarmouth(commanded by Captain William Wilson) and the Bombay MerchantSnow (commanded by Captain Charles Virtue) with cargo from Calcutta and the EagleSnow (commanded by Captain Adam Sheriff) from Bombay (with William Petrie of Madras onboard). Shipped by the Eagle.
